gui.controller

Class LandingPageScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.controller.LandingPageScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gui.controller.IScreenController, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class LandingPageScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, gui.controller.IScreenController
    LandingPageScreenController is a controller class that handles the landing page screen of the GUI application. It implements the Initializable and IScreenController interfaces.
